content: this legal text summarizes a case between two parties mr pg and mr bv regarding the division of two urban areas one area measures 288 square meters and borders the property of an unnamed individual while the other area measures 432 square meters and borders the property of another unnamed individual the case also mentions sanctions related to fire safety laws the resolution of the case assigns shares to each party with mr pg receiving the first share and ownership of the 288 square meter urban area and mr bv receiving the second share and ownership of the 432 square meter urban area each share is valued at euro 864000 the case was documented by notary mb on 932011
